Toured @LeeMontessori in Washington D.C. with a team from Day 1 Academies. It was great to meet these kids ‚Äî they‚Äôre energetic and energizing. Lee is doing an amazing job unleashing their love of learning. https://t.co/1eLIFcPeGD

Picture perfect flight @BlueOrigin. And this vehicle has now flown to space & back six times making this a new milestone. First hotfire of our #BE7 lunar landing engine just yesterday at Marshall Space Flight Center. Data looks great and hardware is in perfect condition. Test went full planned duration ‚Äì 35 seconds. My dad‚Äôs journey to the U.S. shows how people come together to help each other. We got a chance to celebrate him last night for the opening of the Statue of Liberty‚Äôs new museum. This is his story. https://t.co/VdOtlPY953 https://t.co/E4C1KPho2u

At the Statue of Liberty, where my dad‚Äôs being honored with a Liberty Star as part of the new museum‚Äôs opening. We‚Äôre investing $1.5 billion in our new air hub to get you your packages faster. Three million square feet, and it‚Äôs going to create 2,000 jobs. And if you‚Äôre guessing that driving a front loader was fun, you‚Äôre right! #amazon #prime https://t.co/Cud4orKrC4
